input.sentences: the newlywed couple decided to take a vacation
they met a local guide that was taking them around
they made many new friends along the way .
she acted silly by putting fresh flowers in her hair .
the best part of the trip was looking over the mountain and seeing the beautiful scenery
output.sentences: a young couple went on a a scenic trip in the mountains
they went with some close friends
they had a lovely meal together, outdoors
They had fun being silly and cute
They took in the breathtaking scenery
